name: Karen Simulator: Wagecuck vs Karen (itch)
description:
You play as Wagie, a teenager working several menial summer jobs in order to earn money to buy new video games. Wagie expected easy work over the summer. No one, not even he, could foresee that all his colleagues would be mercilessly slaughtered and he would soon have no choice but to load an AR-15 and stop an army of angry women.

Gameplay videos: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=karen+simulator+wagecuck+vs+karen

Features:

  • Play as Wagie
  • A variety of Karen and special bonus enemies to defeat
  • Purchase and use several types of weapons
  • Three playable stages - work as a shelf stacker, school janitor, and human resources manager
  • Take back refunds stolen by Karens to spend on new weapons and ammo
  • Battle the final boss... Giga Karen
